fr.univavignon.rodeo.api

Interface IGameState

  • All Superinterfaces:
    INamedObject

    public interface IGameState
extends INamedObject
    This interface represents a game state. Aims to be instantiated by an IGameStateProvider.
    Author:
    fv

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface fr.univavignon.rodeo.api.INamedObject

        getName

    • Method Detail

      • exploreArea

        void exploreArea()
          throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Unlock a new area / environment. Ensures that all animals of the current area are unlocked and that there is a new area to explore, throwing an IllegalStateException otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If the area cannot be explored.

      • catchAnimal

        void catchAnimal(IAnimal animal)
          throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                 java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Sets the given animal as caught.
        Parameters:
        animal - Animal to caught.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the given animal is null.
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If the given animal can not be found in current areas.

      • getSpecieLevel

        SpecieLevel getSpecieLevel(ISpecie specie)
                    throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Retrieves the level of the given specie.
        Parameters:
        specie - Specie to get level for.
        Returns:
        Current specie level.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the given specie is null

      • getProgression

        int getProgression()
        Computes and returns the game progression percentage.
        Returns:
        The total game progression in percent.
